General.Name: Hangzhou Hopechart Iot Technology
General.Description: Hangzhou Hopechart IoT Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the development, production, and sale of driving systems and advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) in the People's Republic of China. The company offers intelligent network products, including intelligent driving systems and vehicle networking terminals; hardware, such as various types of driving recorders and T-BOX, sensors; and ADAS and other products that are used to record and store the driving speed, time, mileage, location, and other information of heavy trucks and other vehicles. It also provides smart cockpit products, which includes human-computer interaction terminals; and specific products, including vehicle central control screens, car instruments, and other cockpit products. In addition, the company offers vehicle central control panels, such as body control systems, door control systems, gateways, integrated temperature control systems, thermal management controllers, car air-conditioning controllers, car refrigerator controllers, seat Chair controller, and other automotive controller products. Further, it engages in development of software platform. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Building A, Shuixiu Building, Hangzhou, China, 310030
